articles.author: Lisa Schlein
articles.title: WHO Warns Climate Change Causing Surge in Mosquito-Borne Diseases - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: About half the world’s population now is at risk of dengue, the most common viral infection that spreads from mosquitoes to people, according to the World Health Organization.
articles.content: GENEVA  Climate change, deforestation, and urbanization are some of the major risk factors behind the increasing number of outbreaks of viruses such as dengue, Zika, and chikungunya around the world,… [+5258 chars]

articles.author: Tim MacMahon
articles.title: Spurs' Gregg Popovich calls for gun control in U.S., criticizes lawmakers - ESPN
articles.description: Spurs coach Gregg Popovich made an unprompted speech lobbying for gun control legislation in America and criticizing "cowardly legislators who are selfish."
articles.content: DALLAS -- San Antonio Spurs coach Gregg Popovich's pregame media availability Sunday opened with the NBA's all-time wins leader declining to discuss whether he would consider retirement this offseaso… [+5451 chars]
